name: Bubble Wizard
description:
The evil Bubble Wizard has trapped you inside a bubble while you were sleeping. You must travel through difficult levels using your trusty bubble blower. Avoid the obstacles, and try to persevere through the dastardly wizard's insults.

Features:
  • Banger Soundtrack.
  • Unique control scheme.
  • Checkpoints.
  • Three difficulty modes.
  • Three interesting levels.
  • Three unique power-ups.
  • Showdown with the Bubble Wizard.
Can you defeat the Bubble Wizard, or will you die trying?

Made in 3 days for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2021 Jam.

Press 'M' to mute the music.
